content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside on a partly cloudy to clear sky. around 725pm on local time i observed a star like object on a straight path heading from nw to sw bearing. i saw no blinking red, green or white light emmited. lasted about 15 mins before fading out of view. i'm sure it might have been the iss or a man made satellite. fast velocity
content.summary: Red-orange star-like high altitude

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting at computer (south facing wall) when i heard a frog among the crickets outside. i got up and looked in the backyard through my east facing window(i never hear frogs out here)and saw a red horizontal bar of light slowly descending to the east. at first i thought it was some kind of firework. only saw it for a few seconds before trees obscured its descent. kept watching through the window for a minute, looked away then back again. saw the red bar above the obscuring trees moving slowly south. the bar now had blue lights around it and descended again out of sight after a few seconds. based on the distance and size it appeared to be from here, it was too big to be a drone. no visible faa lights either. very important to note that the sighting was right under a flight path for planes and helicopters, although from the distance i estimate the object was, it was far too low to have been a plane or a helicopter in the flight path. i saw no other objects in the flight path or parallel to it until after the sighting. i did not hear anything from the direction of the object. waited with crappy camera to at least capture the light on video, but i did not see the ufo again.
content.summary: Bar of red light/bar surrounded by blue lights

content.detailedDescription: It was a fairly good size orange light. it did not seem to move at all. there was a visable star  or appeared to be a star very close to it...Then it began to fade and seemed to move towards the star and then just disappeared. again, it seemed to be large and it did not seem to be moving until it vanished. i took a picture but do not have my cord to connect to download....Thanks for your time.
content.summary: Large orange red light

content.detailedDescription: Noticed pulsating light thought it was a plane but remained stationary and lights were wrong. several other witnesses. including wife, pizza shop employees and neighbors. sighting is active as of reporting will follow up.
content.summary: Current sighting as of reportint this object still hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Object first flashed bright after 20 seconds flashed quickly one time 
after 35 to 45 seconds a long glowing bright light for approximately 1 second waited about 30 seconds and saw that object started to move from stationary position with a quick flash. this repeated for about 30 minutes noticing 5 to 6 different types of signal flashing from the object. object paused twice during this flight of path from the north east to the northwest about 85 degrees in the sky.
content.summary: Observed a flash in the sky thinking possible meteor hitting atmosphere then noticed another flash and watched for over 30 minutes as object move from northeast to northwest about 85 degrees in the sky slowing hovering and then taking path flash pulsation

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way back to orlando, fl where i lived from visiting my family for christmas in nh in 2013. i had gotten a nikon d3200 dslr for christmas and was talking photos of the plane ride back. appoximately in the virginia/north carolina coast, but still 100% undetermined, i first saw a bright reflective object not moving and was over land and over clouds. a more precious location can be determined by the coast formation on the photos. i immediately started photographing it. it seemed an undetermined distance away, but a good distance away. i observed and photographed the object when i could see it through my camera. i took 7 photos throughout the 4 minute period i made the observation. it was difficult to get focus on the object given the distance, so that's why only 7 photos were taken. i also photographed a moving airplane with contrail in the same frame as the the non moving object that is moving right to left. i photograph it starting on the right and over a few photos, ends up on the left of the object, showing it hadn't moved. after 4 minutes and the moving of the plane, i lost sight of both of the object and airplane. i was moving right to left with the object as well. all photos come with details of the camera used, settings used and times. my camera was not set to the right time, but it does show the first and last photos being about 4 minutes apart. the photos also need to be zoomed in to see the object and other airplane, except for the first one, which shows the reflective properties of the object that initially caught my attention.
content.summary: Object observed and photographed from airplane with another airplane in the same sky as object

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my front porch smoking a cigar. in the east sky i saw a bright light, not blinking moving toward the house. there are a lot of planes that fly over our house and it was the same altitude as the planes though not in any of the normal paths. i watched for 30 seconds listening for the sound of a jet. there was not a single sound, nor where there any planes in the sky. i grabbed my wife and daughter and pointed it out. we watched as it went over head.

i smoke a cigar every night and watch the stars. i hear and see planes every night. this was not a plane as the lights were not blinking, nor was there any sound.
content.summary: Solid bright light moving at high speed across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Estimados, el objeto apareciã³ en una foto tomada en la ruta nacional 5,saliendo de la localidad de san gregorio de polanco, departamento de rio negro, uruguay, cuando tomamos la foto el objeto no era visible, es mã¡s al revisar las fotos (3) se veã­an negras porque mi cã¡mara no tiene capacidad para sacar sin luz, verã¡n en la imagen que no se ven estrellas, no habã­a luz de luna, cielo completamente estrellado. antes de eliminar las fotos pude diferenciar un punto dorado que al ampliarlo quedã³ visible lo que en la imagen se ve. en ese momento ã©ramos 4 personas observando el cielo.
content.summary: El objeto solo fue visible en la foto

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving a car, my wife was sitting next to me who sighted this bright shining object and showed to me, since it appeared in the same direction i was driving, i was able to see it while driving. we were able to see this shining object and it appeared like moving with a high speed and disappeared within few seconds. 

after a short while she sighted another similar object this time coming from west and moving towards south, the shape and size was similar to the earlier one, sighting of both did not lost more than 20 secs.
content.summary: Shining object appeared like moving with a high speed disappeared within few seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was outside around 9:15 pm talking on my cell with my old high school buddy. as he spoke i looked up and noticed a green faint light moving along a path in the sky. i remember my grandfather would tell me that they were satellites. so as we continued to talk this green "sattellite" came to a abrupt halt. and that's what stopped me from talking and i stared at this green thing alone in the cul de sac of my home. then the size of the diameter increased to a big white circle. like a flashlight had turned on, but no light was cast down. just a big white circle of light. i froze! i got a little freaked out thinking is this my first ufo experience? then the big circle of light reduced circumference and resumed the star like size it was before and it did this crazy zig zag "scribble", (like a laser light being moved really crazy, it was a laser though) then it just zoomed off! like it punched the pedal to the metal!!! that what makes me believe it wasn't a drone. they way it shot off into space is exactly how it's displayed on ufo shows.  and i never go outside and talk on the phone.  i had this feeling it was observing me for some strange reason then bolted.
content.summary: Thought it was a satellite

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were taking pics of the eclipse when the eclipse was full i felt something was behind us we saw bright orange lights behind us they were very bright orange they were moving in groups of 2 we looked at them with the binoculars and we could see a didiamond shaped craft i took pics and video of them then they turned to the north and went out of sight this is the 11th time we have seen these i hope you can tell us what we are seeing
content.summary: My wife and i were watching the eclipse when we saw bright orange lights behind us

content.detailedDescription:
I was awakened by the smell of smoke at 0230 in the morning of saturday 10/02/2015. we live in the east county san diego and with our current ca drought, fire is always a concern! i stepped out onto the second story deck of our home to scan the horizon for any indication of a fire. i immediately saw the bright light on the horizon and at first thought it to be either a landing aircraft on approach to lindbergh field or a cdf spotter plane/helicopter with it's flashing red/green lights. when i didn't see any orange hue indicative of a fire, i again noticed that the 'object' had not moved from the location where i first observed it. i am not a pilot, however as a police officer i have numerous flight hours in both our police fixed-wing aircraft & helicopters, conducting both aerial surveillance & photography. this object was way too high in elevation to be a spotter plane or helicopter.

this was neither a fixed wing aircraft, helicopter or a drone and definitely not a star on the horizon! after it's initial 'side to side' motion, it remained in a fixed location, continually pulsating different colored lights, and at one point splitting in to two objects, then rejoining into one. after observing it for several minutes i awoke my wife to show her the object. as my wife continued to watch the object, i ran downstairs to grab both my camera and my spotting scope. i only have a small olympus digital camera with a 4x zoom, but i was able to record the object as it hovered. when observed through my shooting spotting scope, it appeared to be 'diamond' shape and pulsating colors even more rapidly!

my wife & i have both watched some of the programs on tv about these type of events, and this seemed very 'a-typical' of a ufo event with the hovering object, pulsating colors, and rapid disappearance. after watching the object for about 30 minutes, my wife went back to bed. i went in to get better dressed and remain up watching when i returned back outside to my upper deck, the object had vanished!
content.summary: The object hovered over the local mountains for apprx. 30 minutes changing directions then stationary with pulsating colored lights.

content.detailedDescription:
My neighbors and i(vietnam era marine and navy and myself retired army)   were sitting outside drinking beers and talking. it was about 2045 at night.I thought i saw a falling star. then i looked up again and the light got brighter then dimmed out. so i kept ;ooking im that direction and low and behold it did it again. so i told the squid and jarhead look up, there's a light in a stationary position getting brighter and fading out. we went back and fourth with the bs so i went to the house. 
about 90 minutes later at 2234hrs my neighbor the marine text me and said he seen the light also after going out to smoke a cigarette. he said it got real bright and faded out and it didn't move.
the best way for mr to gtve a position is to put a 12" ruler on polaris and look to the left at about 10 to 12 inches and it's in that general area. i saw it again last night but soon after the cloud cover moved in.
content.summary: Stationary pulsating light to the left of polaris.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog in the park at about 6 am to 6:15 am. we have a major flight path over the park and you can see and hear the jets and their navigation lights even at 35000 feet.Anyway, something caught my attention to my right. at first i thought it was a jet flying low roughly 18000 feet just below the lowest cloud. there wasn't any sound and no navigation lights. it was going about 3 times the speed of a normal jet holding its trajectory not dimming and falling to the ground like a shooting star. i watched it go over the mountain continuing its path until it disappeared. the light omitted from it was very bright but definitely not an aircraft that i've seen before.
content.summary: White dot travelling 3 x faster than jet no sound no navigation lights @ about 20000 ft

content.detailedDescription: Traveling west on pecos rd in ahwatukee az, saw a strange object in the sky that looked darkish and diamond shaped. i followed it snapping pictures, once i got into a good stopping point along side of the road,i took a few more pictures of this thing descending over to the back side of south mountain.
content.summary: Ufo seen in ahwatukee az by south mountain

content.detailedDescription:
This was october 1973, possibly 1974.  it was a common occurrence for my mother and i to observe strange objects it the air that looked like nothing we have ever seen.  triangular objects that would stop and start randomly.  objects that were more circular that would move vertically as well as horizontally.  it seemed as it they were preforming for us.  it was explained , by my mother, that they were "experimental" air craft from the air force base in columbus ms.  we looked forward to our entertainment.  one fall evening, my parents were in the house and i was outside alone.  i wandered several hundred yards behind our house and felt, heard, and saw simultaneously a large, cigar/blimp shaped object.  a fat cigar or skinny blimp.  it was a dull pewter color. then it emitted  a white light down.  the craft was not on the ground, but hovered just below tree level.  i was drawn to the light, had a feeling of total comfort, almost euphoria.  i have no idea how i got there, but i came to in a room with no windows, there were no lights, but it was very bright.  there were 3 male and 1 female human-like "people" there.  the men looked like super athletes.  close to 7 feet tall.  blond hair, blue eyes which were a little larger than normal.  the clothing was plain, but skintight, almost appeared to be painted on.  the woman was a few inches shorter, very curvy.  i was only 7-8 years old, but i immediately had a feeling of comfort, trust...And even attraction to her.  as i was looking around, i had no discomfort, all i could move was my eyes and head.  they touched me, had something like a wand and went all around me with it, the entire time we communicated but didn't talk.    it was primarily them telling me the evils of nuclear power/weapons and to always do all i could to stay away from and stop its use.  they also told me that they would be watching after me and "mine", not to worry, i would always be taken care of. over the next few years, i had communication with them, but it was less vivid memory.  i would be asleep, have almost a feeling of a dream i was aboard, then wake up in a chair outside.  i always felt great after these visits.  i found my self looking forward to these.   i told my mother after the first and every other encounter i had.   she told me that she believed me and that it could be real or could be a dream.  but convinced me not to tell anyone else, because they would not understand and it would make life hard on me.  some time later i noticed a 2-3 cm hard object just under the skin on my left outer mid-thigh.  i have asked several doctors, but have had no explanation on what it is.  i have had spontaneous pneumothorax (collapsed lung for no apparent reason) 5 times as a teenager.  no problems since.  i put this repressed, or did not think that this could be real, as these were not bad experiences and were not like aliens that i have read about.  i did a search on the internet to find a movie, and a picture of the type of "people" that took me came up.  that is when i have had a flood of these memories return.   
i have a great life, i am a successful eye doctor, with a wonderful, healthy family.  i just had to report this and want to know if there are any other similar reports.
content.summary: I was a child, was brought aboard craft.  i was not abused.  i lived it.  they made me feel safe.  human like. beautiful.I

content.detailedDescription: I was a young child living in the country. i awoke and found two figures at the foot of my bed looking at me and gesturing to each other. no sound was made, they were completely black, not dressed in black but rather made of black with red glowing eyes. i was terrified and pulled the blankets over my head and woke up the next morning. twenty years or so later i had a very real dream of a man threatening me to not mention any of these events or my family would be hurt. ever since then i wake up multiple times a night, i'm scared to look in mirrors or out windows or in shadows during the times i'm awake at night. no idea if that has anything to do with my dream but it feels like it is.
content.summary: Woke to find two figured at the foot of bed looking at me

content.detailedDescription: I was in the passenger seat driving with my mom on folsom auburn road. i noticed a stranger cloud we where heading towards and i had the feeling i needed to watch the cloud. just then the disc shape craft cam out of the front of the cloud. it was grey not smooth or shiny though. we where about to pass under the craft so i was leaning forward in my seat to watch it and it slowly cut over the top of some trees that where on the side of the road. it was out of site after that. right after that i looked at my mom and she asked what was that and i said a ufo she laughed and thought i was joking. when i tried to tell her seriously she looked at me like i was on drugs or something. i tried to talk to a couple people about it but got similar looks. that's why i didn't report it till now. it's very upsetting that i couldn't talk to my family or anyone for fear of people thinking i'm insane or something. i just wanted to put it out there to see if anyone else may have seen it so i can have some reassurance. thank you
content.summary: Came out of cloud while i drove uner it then cut over trees out of site.

content.detailedDescription: While heading off to newcastle airport via taxi at 05.00 am observed the above object in the early morning night sky.This was witness by myself,fellow passenger and taxi driver.It was  large about 10 times the size/brightness of venus in the morning sky and really stood out from the other stars present at that time .Emitting a brilliant white light like a arc welder torch.Definitely not a plane or helicopter.Was still present at arrival at airport 10 mins later.A lot of people must of witnessed it as people were arriving for flights and others leaving at same time.
content.summary: Large bright arc welder light object in morning sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was making test with my camera (sony alpha 7r, full frame). i took many pictures that evening. i noticed a light on one of my pictures after shooting the pictures. it seemed first like a planet or star, but when i looked at the picture taken just 9 seconds before and the next one taken 15 seconds after, the object did not show on these other pictures.

i was shooting raw, which means that the photographs are unprocessed images captured by the sensor. i'm willing to share those raw files.
content.summary: Illuminated object captured by camera.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
While standing on my balcony smoking a cigarette, off to my left above the rooftops further out i saw what thought was  string of balloons rotating in the sky. but for being so high and far away they would have had to be really large. my balcony veiw can see where the planes come in and circle before landing. i saw a plane a minutes before but none during the entire time the objects crossed the sky. 
    the rotating string of objects although rotating were also moving across the sky fast, and smoothly changed from rotating to slithering up and down in tight formation still looking connected. the motions looked like a dragon. and i'm now saying to myself what am i looking at.It didn't seem like something balloons would do,but i still felt it was some sort of objects on a string, until it changed directions and formation again. as this is happening the objects were moving in almost a circle path around my point of veiw. so when they made this formation change into a v formation they were turning towards my direction now getting closer. i now felt ok its a huge fleet of birds, but i could see no wings moving. getting closer i could now see the motions of the objects changing directions like fish, but still saw no wings or flapping. and the speed was to fast for birds. once to the east of my sight the objects changed formation again to the string pattern and changed direction moving away,where i could see they were not connected, where no birds, or balloons. each time the formation changed  different object took the lead  which doesnt seem possible something connected. i've lived within eyesite of major airports my entire life but was left feeling scared from what i saw. i never saw birds that big, fly in such tight and strange patterns, and especially that fast. and i've never seen that many fighters at once,that low, or with no sound.
content.summary: A string of 50 or more objects with high altitude changed direction and formation several times while passing

content.detailedDescription:
I was playing in the neighbor's backyard when my sister started yelling and screaming from the front yard, she's fairly dramatic and we ignored her for a while and then took our time going around the house to see what was up...Looking at her friend who was speachless and full of fear.. i thought my sister hurt herself... but she pointed to the south.. and there was a large craft heading away from us that disappeared at the end of the road through trees(no leaves), the craft was metallic, almost reflective.. it's top and bottom were angled slightly in while the middle of it was more verticle and had panel sections that were darker and may have been windows.. the verticle section was over 10' tall.. my guess on the overall height would be around 20-25' and the width was around 100-160', the wall panel area did not rotate, but the lower and upper areas could have.  height above the ground 500' or less.. looked like it passed over the tall trees at the end of the road by about 1 or 2 times their height. my sister and friend both said it came from the north and went right down the middle of the road.. it did not appear to change elevation or direction... where i was playing tight to the backside of a house... we did not notice any noise, smell or shadow that alerted us.. just my sisters scream... my sister said that she saw a person in the vehicle's window... her friend didn't say that she did... we told my mom...Who thought my sister was up to her old tricks.. tried to let the subject go.. but, she finally called my dad... who came home earlier but not immediately.. we described it to him all four of us and then he called somebody to report it... i believe he called the farmington police and/or oakland county sheriffs department... there were other reports like it and then he called my mom's cousin, who was a high up in the air force at wright-patterson... the next day two men in a unmarked dark sedan showed up, and we told them what we saw.. they asked some questions, talked a little with dad and then left, then in the next day or two after dinner, mom's cousin came to the house, dressed in uniform with another man that was not (and said almost nothing), we (sister and i)were asked about it and after my mom made tea, she took me and my two sisters for a walk.. in the dark... i think that is the first time we ever did that that late at night...And that was it nothing more.. ( this was when i was 6 or 7 my sister was 11 or 12).. until about 15 years ago a good friend of mine said the old neighbor would be in town and wanted to see me.. we met for dinner and she brought the ufo up... in nearly the same way.. and it still bothers her and her sister... my sister still remembers it too.

a couple of weeks went by and as i was visiting my parents i mentioned that i saw her and then brought up the ufo...He said quite bluntly that it was a ufo that was confirmed by mom's cousin in the air force.. my mom startled me when she said her cousin was on a team that retrieves downed ufo's...

as a side note... a couple of years later my mom had a stroke and i was talking to my dad and he brought up the ufo sighting, said he was sorry for not taking about it earlier, but he was asked not to.. and then said that the last time he visited with mom's cousin.. he asked him about his work.. and he said that.. there are space crafts and aliens... upon my dad's death, unknown co-workers (1940-1962) told me about his past employment.. dad told us he was a chief draftsmen for a defense contractor ( the only lie i have ever heard him say)... they said he was the companies top manager of engineering.. designed the guidance gyro's for the navies bo-mark (nuclear defense miss el), dart drone gyro copter, target practice jet drones for the korean war...They all figured he was a dead man when he quit in 1962... either by cia/fbi or by russians...Too much important design knowledge... they said  multiple times the feds came in and gave them a scare/threatened if they were to leave..
content.summary: Large metal disc 100'-160' wide traveling straight south

content.summary: Too many to explain, yes of n.O.C. shift sighting, odd dreams

content.detailedDescription: S/a
content.summary: Wing shaped v in the middle 80 to 100 feet long. all chrome watched for 10 seconds. it disappeared then reappeared  5 seconds later..It had moved left and forward 300 feet for another 10 seconds then disappeared  for good.

content.detailedDescription: It was sometime in june,before school had started.My daughter and i go rutine night fishing,thats what we were doing when the sighting occured.It was about 9:10 p.M. we both got in my car and headed down the road.My daughter is very into the ufo phenomena and always learns as much information about them as possible.The entire time we drove down the rode to the waters edge,she kept her eyes to the sky looking for anything 'unusual'.Once we reached out spot,we both got out of the car and began to set up our small bit of fishing gear.Theres a large rock that my daughter and i always sit on,it was the best place to fish.Because i had nothing else to do i kept my eyes on the sky and noticed a small orange orb lingering like a star.I kept my eye on it as my daughter continue fishing.It began to move and i quickly alerted my daughter. she lookd up happily she'd seen ufos before so she was excited to add another sighting.As the object began to move it made a large circle around us, after about 30 minutes watching it i noticed several other small lights with it. after a full circle was made i grew tense so i told my daughter to pack up all the fishing gear and jump in the car.We did. at first the car had trouble starting but after a few twists of the key the car started.I began driving down the long narrow road that led to our fishing spot. my daughter kept her eyes to the sky and informed me that it was following us. after a long pause of silence 3 patterned beeps were emitted from the car, my daughter and i didn't recognize them. i wanted to continue driving but i had to hold because of a stoplight.I wasn't paying attention to the skies but my daughter was she asked me how the object new where we lived. northwest of our location was our home. the object continue down the road and turned directly over our house. the light turned green and i drove to our house. as soon as we reached the lawn i stop the car, jumped out, and ran to the door.My daughter stood outside trying to catch a glimpse of the object but the area we lived in at the time was wooded so you'd imagine it was no use
content.summary: The sphere followed us home at night

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside.  very bright light.  then went away.  then lit up 30 seconds later. then off.  kept going in different locations. back and forth.
content.summary: Pulsating light.  very bright.  then less bright.  random movements.  airplane in area but this was not an airplane.

content.detailedDescription: I was vacationing in san carlos, sonora mexico when i stopped my vehicle to take a picture of the marina with my mobile phone. i didn't notice anything in the sky but i was looking at my phone screen when i took the picture. when i looked at the picture later, i noticed the yellow spot so i zoomed in and saw the yellow shape.I have shown it to several local people and no one has seen anything around that looks similar.
content.summary: I took a quick photo and noticed the yellow shape later .Did not see it when i took the picture but i wasn't looking.

content.detailedDescription: My husband was sitting in the back yard with a friend. the light of something coming from the direction off the field behind our home. he says it was like a firework that was silent and had a tail. it flew overhead (within 20 ft) across our yard and disappeared or burned out. it was right at dusk. on the other side of the field where this came from is a storage building sales lot and interstate 10, eastbound.
content.summary: Like a rocket/firework

content.detailedDescription: It was late at night, i was inside on my bed with a clear view of a near treeline and the sky. i had been looking out into the night sky for a while, when suddenly the dark sky turned bright, not quite white, but like the entire sky was illuminated, and at the center of what i could see was a blurred out sort of shape, which i now believe was the source of the light. at the time it seemed as if it only lasted a second but i am actually unsure since i have no way of confirming the time of when it even began, it could have lasted way longer and i will never know. after it had gone dark again, i can only describe what i felt as shock and i was almost unable to move, i am not sure if it was fear or not. i remember staring at the sky for a long while until i eventually woke up my sister to recount the event to her. i am still not sure what happened exactly but i know it did happen.
content.summary: Bright light that lit up entire sky in view with unknown effects and slight object in center

content.detailedDescription:
We got out for a walk and i noticed a red/orange flashing light in the sky that caught my eye. it was moving extremely fast. being in nepean, we see airplanes lights landing at ottawa airport every nights and i know what they look like. 
as i am starring at the blinking light, it made a sharp change of direction then stopped. i told my wife and my daughter to look at the red light. then it started to move right then left then it went down fast and made another complete stop for a few second then down again very fast until we lost sight of if. 
it looked like an airplane light but did not move at all like any airplane i have ever seen.
airplanes are linear type lights with no sudden change. military air planes do not move that fast to come to a complete stop and drop again. it was fascinating. myself,  my wife and my daughter all saw this. 

i hope someone else report the same sighting so we can maybe figure out where it came down. 
difficult to estimate distance in the night sky but since i was seeing the blinking red/orange lights, i would guess between richmond and 416. but again.. hard to tell how far.  

i want to keep my mind open but i can't come up with a rational explanation... 

i will look at the sky with more interest now!!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red flashing lights with sudden change of directions. stationary / accent / descent
